\csdef{cl_header_text}{%
    Bildungsdirektion\\%
    Bildungsplanung\\%
    \ifx\@subject\@empty\@title\else\@subject\fi\\%
    \thepage/\pageref{LastPage}}

\csdef{cl_header_content}{%
    \parbox{8.5mm}{\includegraphics[width=6mm]{logo_ktzh_flag_71x71.png}}%
	\parbox{55mm}{\raggedright\hyphenrules{nohyphenation}\csuse{cl_header_text}}}

\csdef{def_header}{%
    \KOMAoptions{headwidth=head:15mm:8.5mm}%
    \clearpairofpagestyles
    \lehead[\csuse{cl_header_content}]{\csuse{cl_header_content}}
    \rohead[\csuse{cl_header_content}]{\csuse{cl_header_content}}}
